creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a young woman with her hair in a bun wearing a scarf, oversized sweater and skirt against a short wall with a wrought iron fence above it
markings: on back on sticker: Joanne Leonard / 1319 Pomona Rd. / Ann Arbor, MI  48103
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard / JOANNE LEONARD
title: Julia in Luxembourg Gardens, Paris
